meta.name: Create client onboarding projects, contracts and Slack channels from form data

name: Automate client onboarding: form to Asana projects, contracts & Slack

parameters.content:
## üöÄ Client Onboarding Automation

### How it works
This workflow automates the complete client onboarding process for service businesses. When a new client submits their intake form, the workflow creates a project in Asana with all necessary tasks, generates a customized service agreement from a Google Docs template, emails the contract to the client, and sets up communication channels. All client data is logged to Google Sheets for tracking.

### Setup steps
1. Connect your Asana, Google Docs, Google Drive, Gmail, Google Sheets, and Slack accounts
2. Create a template project in Asana with your standard onboarding sections and tasks
3. Set up a Google Docs template with placeholder text for contract generation
4. Configure the webhook endpoint in your intake form
5. Update template IDs and workspace references to match your setup
6. Test with sample data to verify the flow

## üì• Webhook & Data Processing

Receives client intake form data via webhook POST request and parses 70+ fields including contact info, business details, technical requirements, and service preferences.

## üìã Asana Project Setup

Creates a new Asana project for the client, copies sections from a template project, retrieves all tasks from each section, and assigns them to the new project to ensure consistent onboarding structure.

## üìÑ Contract Generation

Retrieves a Google Docs template, replaces placeholders with client-specific information (name, fees, dates), downloads the personalized contract as PDF, then resets the template for the next client.

## üìß Client Communication

Sends a personalized welcome email to the client with their contract attached, includes links to schedule an onboarding call and complete additional forms.

## üíæ Data Logging & Team Setup

Logs all client information to Google Sheets for centralized tracking and creates a dedicated Slack channel for team communication about the new client.

## üîê Credentials & Security

Required: Asana OAuth2, Google Docs/Drive/Sheets OAuth2, Gmail OAuth2, Slack API token. Replace all template IDs, workspace numbers, and email addresses with your own before publishing.
